message.content:
cs.NE, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CL, cs.CV. 

The paper proposes a new method to augment recurrent neural networks with extra memory, which is closely related to Long Short-Term Memory networks. Therefore, cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing) is the most likely sub-category. The paper also discusses the system's associative memory, which is related to Holographic Reduced Representations, a technique used in natural language processing, which suggests cs.CL (Computation and Language) as another likely sub-category. The paper also presents experiments on memorization tasks, which suggests cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.LG (Machine Learning) as likely sub-categories. Finally, the paper uses image datasets in its experiments, which suggests cs.CV (Computer Vision) as a possible sub-category.
